summary: Implements a mock version of the AWS Elastic Beanstalk service for the Moto testing framework, including custom error handling, an in‑memory backend for applications, environments and solution stacks, API endpoint simulations, and helper utilities for ARN construction.
business_intent: Allows developers to write and run automated tests that interact with Elastic Beanstalk APIs without contacting real AWS services, speeding up development and reducing costs.
